name: Keep us alive
description:
!! fullscreen recommended !!

Press space bar to grind  people.

Hold mouse left button to Grab people, Pick up Items!

Click mouse left button to Bounce bullet off!

Welcome!

You'll become a mascot of Magical girl, Kururun!

Your mission is grinding people to save the world!

It's time to be a little bit cruel, kuru kuru kururun~☆
